title: Sir Princess Petra's Talent
description: Book # 2 in the Multi-Award-Winning Humorous Fantasy Series for Kids.Sir Princess Petra has already proven she is a kind and noble knight. This, however, does not please the king and queen---they want her to behave like a princess and forget thissilly knight nonsense of hers!  But when the king writes a new rule in the royal rule book that requires her to attend Talent School and acquire a princess talent certificate or suffer the spell of the royal magician, Petra, reluctantly, agrees to go. But who could have guessed what Sir Princess Petraâ€™s Talent would be?
author: Diane Mae Robinson
